welcome_message_body: Welcome to Leicester, a city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and charming atmosphere. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Hot Dog Annie's
restaurants.description: Hot Dog Annie's is a hot dog joint located in Leicester.

restaurants.name: Eller's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Eller's Restaurant is a american restaurant located in Cherry Valley.

restaurants.name: The Twisted Fork Bistro
restaurants.description: The Twisted Fork Bistro is a breakfast spot located in Cherry Valley.

restaurants.name: Livia's Dish, A Unique Dining Experience
restaurants.description: Livia's Dish, A Unique Dining Experience is a italian restaurant located in Worcester.

restaurants.name: Fratelli's Corner Crust Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Fratelli's Corner Crust Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Worcester.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nottingham Airport, handling freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time or data limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
